:::{#me}

Hi, my name is Romeo. I love cuddling and begging for attention. I was adopted for \$200 along with my brother, and I racked up \$7,000 in medical bills during the first month of being adopted.

## Goals
* Lick plastic
* Purr the loudest
* Explore the world

## Education
Hannah's University for Cats
*Expected graduation: Oct 2026*

## Skills
* Can give high fives as high as two feet off the ground
* Can spin on command
* Will stand and hang out on shoulders as necessary
* Will come running anytime "Never Gonna Give You Up" by Rick Astley plays

:::

Thanks for checking out my web site!
